title: Request: OCE ranked cutoff times
body:
Hello All,

Unfortunately life atm means that I am awake past the average joe, thanks to work, and typically end up sleeping at about 12:00p.m (midday). This means that ranked is typically cut off for me in the middle of couple hours worth of gaming. 

I am unsure how accurate the matchmaking is during cutoff time, or how the population numbers are monitored, which makes me wonder if it has improved since this was implemented. Would a re-evaluation of this cutoff time be required? Do many other people want to play ranked past the 4 a.m mark or am I the only one?

replies.body: Oceanic ranked matchmaking is bad enough as it is.
